channel.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
channel.description:
(cause thats what we want to do with population control not being a problem already)
[url='https://news.uk.msn.com/uk/articles.aspx?cp-documentid=153867323']https://news.uk.msn.com/uk/articles.aspx?cp-documentid=153867323[/url]
What are your peoples opinions eh?
Honestly, im with this post ;
"bollicks to them, i want to wake up on a Saturday morning to big greasy english breakfast with black pudding, bacon and sausage with the fat and grease still dripping off. I want my MacDonald's to make me feel like av put on a stone as soon i finish it and i want my kebabs to be greasy. Second hand smoke, alcohol and wars will kill us all anyway apparently so why not."
:smiley:

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Doom
item.description:
(rot)(fodder:

I’d say get rid of the stupid people, but they seem to be the majority.

Why are you assuming you’re not part of the group of stupid people?

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
Medevilae:

It’d be a lonely country, over here in America

It would be a wasteland, just one with vegetation that hasn’t been deforested. And pets roaming the place with one or two people around.

EDIT: Cannibalism would be insufficent since there would be no fat people or needless politicians to pick off.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes

(rot)(fodder:

I’d say get rid of the stupid people, but they seem to be the majority.

It’d be a lonely country, over here in America

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
I work for some REALLY stupid people.
About once a day someone will ask where the bathrooms are; for cryin’ out loud, there’s signs on BOTH of the doors.
You know those grocery carts that have the stupid car-shaped plastic shells on them? Almost every time a customer comes up to the register with one of those pieces of shit, they want to switch carts!
Don’t get me started on the stupidity regarding refrigerated products, if I received a check for the value of a diary/produce/frozen/deli item that was left on a shelf every time some redneck figures they don’t need it out of sight of a cooler, I’d be a bit richer.

Read full topic

item.description:
Stupid people will always affect us negatively one way or another.

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
Let the fatties get fat, it’s not like poor people are disproportionately fat, get public healthcare, and then everyone else gets to pay for all the fucked up preventable diseases that being fat causes. Sounds like a good plan to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

What they have to remember is the CHOICE is OURS, we are aware of what happens to our bodies. this is the least of our concerns.

You have too much faith in humanity, I’m absolutely sure there is an abundance of people out there that are dumbfounded by even the simplest parts of their own bodies.

I say let the fatties fatten themselves up.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Scrawny
item.description:
Always in moderation, in moderation…

Why cant we learn this lesson? or at least some of us.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
If people want to commit a slooooooooooooooooow suicide, they should be able to. If people want to eat greasy shit, let them, it’s their life.

Those that actually care about their health won’t come near the greasy shit anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Scrawny
item.description:
Patonki:

I’m all for banning fat people

First time I read this I thought it said burning… : O grease fire!

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes

item.description:
All I know is this thread has made me really hungry for greasy, fatty things

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
acade365:

that’s either a really small hamburger or some really big hands.

That’s actually the size of a Big Mac over here in Belgium…

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: Pokemon_Eater
item.description:
If you go out and eat at McDonald’s every day and you have to buy two tickets just so you can fly on an airplane, you either ban fat in foods or give the fatasses a loaded gun with one round chambered to press against their temple.

If you can’t control yourself and stop yourself from bringing society to its knees with narcotics, tobacco, and now fatty foods, then you deserve to be treated like a toddler. Destroying yourself and crowding hospitals with your disease and forcing them to spend thousands of dollars to save your irresponsible ass is no worse than larceny or tax evasion.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Patonki:

I’m all for banning fat people

^this

But banning the fat in the food is a stupid idea. It’s not like junk food is the cheapest and poor people suffer because of that. Stupid fat people get fat* because they’re … well … stupid.

[COLOR=‘Black’]*I know there are also people who are fat because of some diseases 'n stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Fat Ban Could Save Lifes

item.description:
What they have to remember is the CHOICE is OURS, we are aware of what happens to our body’s. this is the least of our concerns.

Read full topic
